chapters.title: Chapter 24:  Honey in the Tea
chapters.info: Garen, p. 512—Apparently a hero of Ghealdan's past. His wall is defended by the King or Queen. Shein Chunla allegedly made some mistakes during her time as Amyrlin that caused the Third War of Garen's Wall, though those were secretly the Hall's mistakes. See also Kigarin, Alliandre Maritha.
